resources.string:
Hi, my name is RENATO. 

I love GAMES. 

The kind that is GAMES and GAMES around in an PC or NOTEBOOK, or a PLAYSTATION, and definitely the COMPUTER. 
Fun fact is that I have several GAMES and also a COMPUTER. 

I like eating GAMES, too. Raw GAMES. Grilled GAMES. Smoked GAMES. Poached GAMES - not so much. 
And sometimes I even go GAMING. 
And even less sometimes, I actually catch something. 

Once, when I was camping in Canada, and very hungry, I even caught a large GAME with my hands. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to make your own GAME. 
You should ask someone else about GAMES, though.
